title: Bob Marley - Wail'n Soul'm Singles Selecta [FLAC] TQMP
description:
Bob Marley & The Wailers - Wail'n Soul'm Singles Selecta
2005

Brought to you by TQMP
The Quality Music Project

This set comprises the A and B sides of the first ten singles that Bob Marley & The Wailers released on their debut imprint Wail 'n Soul 'm. These tracks, wich have gone to be re-recorded over the next decade, were repressed in Jamaica for several years and many of the lyrics have been recycled in later songs. These twenty tracks are in many ways the true bedrock of Bob Marley & The Wailers career and are fine examples of just how good a songwriter Bob Marley was a young man in his early twenties.
(CD liner notes)

May the lord, the Flying Spaghetti Monster, bless his soul.

1- Bend Down Low (Wail'n Soul'm version)
2- Freedom Time
3- Stir It Up
4- This Train
5- Nice Time (Wail'n Soul'm version)
6- Hypocrites
7- Mellow Mood (Wail'n Soul'm version)
8- Thank You Lord (Wail'n Soul'm version)
9- Bus Dem Shut
10- Lyrical Satirical (part 1)
11- Funeral
12- Pound Get A Blow
13- Steppin' Razor
14- Hurtin' Inside (Wail'n Soul'm version)
15- Play Play
16- Them Have Fi Get A Beatin'
17- Fire Fire
18- Don't You Rock My Boat
19- Chances Are (Wail'n Soul'm version)
20- Lord Will Make Away Somehow
21- Hypocrites (vocal channel)
22- Thank Your Lord (vocal channel)
23- Studio Chat

Artwork (300dpi scan) included.
